name: Clarity
description: The answer should be clear and easy to understand.

name: Accuracy
description: The answer must be factually correct and precise.

name: Completeness
description: The answer should cover all necessary points without missing key information.

name: Relevance
description: The answer must directly address the question asked.

name: Depth
description: The answer should provide detailed insights beyond superficial information.

name: Conciseness
description: The answer should be succinct and avoid unnecessary verbosity.

name: Engagement
description: The answer should maintain the reader's interest and promote understanding.
